@shaaani: It's 2h58 (extended by 16 minutes) version and therefore - unsuitable for small-size encode - even in frame-format above the last one I already have encoded. FYI, I've encoded Avatar in FIVE versions so far and BluRay one was the last one from me.

Also (in my opinion) Avatar is over-hyped mediocre movie (I seen at least dozen better movies in 2009 alone) which separates from most of the baddies only by MadMen like propaganda and -

biggest amount of money  producers or director have spent in tracking down, "hunt&kill" Internet and P2P.

I am mad at myself for even touching the product of sick minds who drove this fucking world in present mess - just because of endless greed and unstoppable hunger for money.

My whole country needs 25 years to get same revenue Avatar generated in one.

Is it unfair?  I  don't think so - because HollyBolly gets money from the same stupid bunch we call - the people.
